gmd:otherCitationDetails.gco:CharacterString: This data set was provided by the NASA EOS Project

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Level 1A collection contains packetized raw detector counts for the 36 MODIS spectral bands as well as engineering and spacecraft ancillary data. Only bands 20 to 36 are used to collect measurements in night mode, while all bands are used in day mode. Version Description: Terra MODIS Version 5 Data Collection Reprocessing
